metadata.Title: CVE-2013-1842 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SQL injection vulnerability in the Extbase Framework in TYPO3 4.5.x before 4.5.24, 4.6.x before 4.6.17, 4.7.x before 4.7.9, and 6.0.x before 6.0.3 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via unspecified vectors, related to "the Query Object Model and relation values."

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-1842` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

typo3 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-5
typo3-database - 4.5.19+dfsg1-5
typo3-dummy - 4.5.19+dfsg1-5
typo3-src-4.5 - 4.5.19+dfsg1-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: typo3-src package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.5.19+dfsg1-5').
